Article.ArticleTitle: Are there cognitive and neuroimaging signatures in long COVID?

Abstract.AbstractText: This scientific commentary refers to 'Markers of limbic system damage following SARS-CoV-2 infection', by Thomasson et al. (https://doi.org/10.1093/braincomms/fcad177).
